name: Russian Train Trip 2
description:
In the second part of Russian Train Trip 2, you will travel to Vladivostok, covering vast distances on a passenger train in a compartment car. Look out the window, listen to the radio, move around the carriage. You are waiting for a fascinating journey.

On the way you can visit 8 major railway stations:
- Moscow (Yaroslavl).
- Yekaterinburg
- Tyumen
- Krasnoyarsk
- Irkutsk
- Ulan-Ude
- Khabarovsk
- Vladivostok

And also a lot of small stations where you can stretch your legs, buy some food, stroll along the platform.
